data.text: À zou ɠundiɠii ná-baala ziʋoiti teʋe,
Moaɓe anzanuiti ta loni ziɛ wolai Aalanɔn maaleʋesuʋɛ,
Moaɓe ɠɔɔʋelaiti ti zeezeibu zɔlɔɔ è ʋɔ bɛ!
Masagi ta ɠa zei Davide ná-masadai unda.
Gi Moaɓe ná-wasogi ma woo mɛnini,
Tama Moaɓe nuiti ta kpee loo
Naa ɠa é ba, nà wɔlɔzu Siɓima ná-leezɛn ɓelei ma
Koozunɛɛi ta undaanɛɛi ɠulaa gulu ɓelei ʋa,
Naa ɠa é ba, sàsu ɠa ɓalizu Moaɓe ná-faa zu eɠɛ kɔnigi,
Moaɓe nuiti pɛtɛ, ti ɓɔɠɔ ɓɔlɔzu zalaɠa ɠula adaʋɛti,
Wooiti kana Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ti woni kaite Moaɓe ná-faa zu.
Za, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠa é ga nii:
